attributes.additional_details: Crack down on the amount of legal and illegal immigrants allowed to flood the streets, schools, housing and work places of Great Britain. It is devaluing our identity, system and overall tolerant society whilst overwhelming our front line service resources and adding to the general misery, contempt and despair for the indigenous British people; Citizens (no matter what creed or skin colour) who suffer harshly under this failing state of ignorant politicians that are fuelled by blind and egotistical greed!
